COMPARISON.0_50: You showed up, and that's how every good inbox begins.
COMPARISON.50_100: You kept the replies flowing and the conversations alive.
COMPARISON.100_500: You handled serious volume and kept everything on track.
COMPARISON.500_2000: You kept things moving while the volume kept climbing.
COMPARISON.2000_10000: You ran high traffic through your inbox without breaking a sweat.
COMPARISON.10000_PLUS: Thatâ€™s a full city of customers knocking on your door. You made it look effortless.

COMPARISON.0_5: A warm-up lap that barely woke the inbox.
COMPARISON.5_10: Enough action to justify a second cup of coffee.
COMPARISON.10_25: Things got busy and the inbox stayed on its toes.
COMPARISON.25_50: A proper rush that barely broke a sweat.
COMPARISON.50_100: Controlled chaos, handled like a normal Tuesday.
COMPARISON.100_500: Absolute dumpster fire, somehow still shipping replies.
COMPARISON.500_PLUS: The inbox lost all chill and never slowed down.

THANK_YOU.TITLE: Congratulations on surviving the inbox of {year}.
THANK_YOU.MESSAGE: Thank you for your incredible dedication to supporting customers throughout this year. Your hard work has made a real difference, and we're grateful to have you on this journey. Here's to making {nextYear} even better together!
